description: A vibrant green veggie packed twist on the classic baked egg dish.
keywords: Shakshuka,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Kale,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Green Shakshuka Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large frying pan on medium high, add the spring onions, spinach, kale and peas and fry for 34 minutes to soften. Add the garlic, most of the chopped herbs, lemon zest and cumin and cook for 2 minutes.
Make gaps in the green mix and crack 2 eggs into each. Cover with the lid and cook for 810 minutes.
Scatter the remaining herbs on top, add a squeeze of lemon and serve.
